title.narrative: Joint UN Initiative for Ecosystem-based Livelihood Promotion in Mizoram

description.narrative: Severe ecosystem damage is continuously being caused and extended due to unsustainable agriculture practices. The challenge remains lack of awareness amongst the people about the consequences of their agriculture practices and also the profits they can receive if the correct practices are adopted. With agriculture being looked at in a negative view as a profitable sector, the youth does not look at it as a lucrative profession and the entrepreneurial activities attached to this sector also remain minimal. Most line department focus on increasing productivity pertaining to their departments. This has sometimes led to glut in the production, followed by season of scarcity. It has at times led to setting up of large plants to process excess when the production was barely enough for local consumption. There is a need to ensure a holistic, coordinated and sustainable area development strategy for optimal utilization of resources. This needs to take into account the farmers perspectives. The project aims at preserving local biodiversity and indigenous knowledge in Mizoram improving livelihood options for local communities.
